name.ja: ライゼオル・ホールスラスター

text.en: Target face-up cards your opponent controls, up to the number of "Raizeol" Xyz Monsters you control; destroy them, then you can attach 1 "Raizeol" card from your GY to 1 Rank 4 Xyz Monster you control as material. You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon using monsters you control, including a "Raizeol" monster. You can only use each effect of "Raizeol Hole Thruster" once per turn.
